com.ubudu.indoorlocation

Interface UbuduBeacon


  • public interface UbuduBeacon
    Interface describing a reference beacon dedicated for Indoor Location.

    • Method Detail

      • accuracy

        double accuracy()
        Returns:
        estiumated distance to beacon in meters.

      • calibration

        double calibration()
        Returns:
        tx power of the beacon as power received with iPhone 5S at 1 meter distance from the device.

      • crc16

        int crc16()
        Returns:
        crc16 for detected beacon.

      • geographicalPosition

        UbuduCoordinates2D geographicalPosition()
        Returns:
        (latitude, longitude) geographical position

      • mac

        java.lang.String mac()
        Returns:
        mac address of the beacon

      • major

        int major()
        Returns:
        major.

      • minor

        Returns:
        minor.

      • name

        java.lang.String name()
        Returns:
        name of the detected bluetooth device.

      • position

        UbuduPoint position()
        Returns:
        (x,y) position.

      • proximityUUID

        java.lang.String proximityUUID()
        Returns:
        proximity UUID.

      • rssi

        double rssi()
        Returns:
        detected rssi level.
